/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Vehicles, including cars and trucks, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
